question: What is the procedure for direct admission to NIET?
answer: Candidate must fill online application form on NIET institute website. Documents need to be verified. Course and Branch will be allocated to candidate according to their merit/test/seat availability. College fee payment for allocated course and branch.

NIET is the first private Institute to get Autonomous status by the UGC in U.P. It is one of the premier Engineering, Management and Pharmacy institutes of Uttar Pradesh and is also recognized by all four ranking and accrediting Government Organizations. The Institute is accredited with NAAC (A grade), all eligible programs (CSE, ECE, ME, IT, BT, MBA, MCA, PGDM and Pharmacy) are NBA accredited, ranked in band of 101-150 for Engineering and 40 th rank in Pharmacy pan India in the National Institutional Ranking Framework (NIRF)-2023, MHRD. The Institute has been awarded with “Diamond Subject Rating” in Engineering and Pharmacy by QS I Gauge Subject Rating and is also recognized in the band Excellent under the category Colleges/ Institute Private/ Self-financed Technical in ARIIA Ranking.

question: What are the Initial documents required for admission?
answer: Candidate applying for admission should carry the original and two sets of photocopies of all his/her testimonials. The documents required are: Aadhar Card 10 th Marksheet and certificate 12 th Marksheet and certificate Graduation degree and mark sheets (in case of PG courses and lateral entry) Proof of Entrance Exam 5 passport size photographs Proof of gap years (if any)

question: How one can deposit college fee?
answer: Candidate can go to NIET website and select the online fee payment option. Demand Draft should be in favour of Noida Institute of Engineering & Technology, Greater Noida, payable at New Delhi

question: What is the average package offered in NIET?
answer: The average package offered in NIET placement record 2024 is 6.02 LPA.

question: I have done 10+2 from NIOS, Am I eligible?
answer: Yes, as per AKTU Norms NIOS Candidate is eligible for B. Tech. admission.

question: Is the transport facility (college bus) available?
Is there any provision for scholarship?
answer: Scholarship provided by the different agencies like UP – State Government, AICTE, NSP, PMS-Online, e-Kalyan, Post Matric Bihar and other departmental scholarships. Bihar Student Credit Card (BSCC) may be also availed by the eligible students of Bihar.
One can reach NIET campus (Plot no 19, Knowledge Park II) by bus, metro from Noida. Delhi NCR, Bulandshahr. https://maps.app.goo.gl/QVZvyNbn8vgf5EiC9

question: How can the institute support, if the candidate wants to apply for an education loan?
answer: Once the candidate has paid the amount to reserve the seat, the Provisional Admission Certificate is issued by the institution. Bona fide, Demand note, Placement details, and any other document required by the bank will be provided to the candidate by the institution enabling them to process for the education loan.

question: What are the timings for admissions?
answer: NIET remains open for admissions between 9:00 a.m. to 5:00 p.m. (IST), Monday to Saturday, except on major Indian holidays.

question: Is there any Housing/hostel accommodation facility?
answer: NIET provides in-campus comfortable and well hygienic hostel accommodation separately for boys and girls with all standard civic amenities. Hostel accommodation is mandatory for all the non-residents of Delhi/NCR.

question: Is there a campus Tour for visitors?
answer: Yes, candidate is taken for a campus visit which includes visit to respective departments, Innovation labs, Library and Hostel and other facilities.

question: Is the college Autonomous? What are the advantages?
answer: Yes, the college is Autonomous and can design its own course curriculum according to the needs of the industry. With this, students are educated about the latest technologies so that they can be prepared according to the needs of the industry to provide them better employment opportunities globally. Soft skills and industrial training are part of the curriculum and we have industry experts on board to take lectures and spread awareness to students through different medium on the latest technologies in industries. One can get honours degree using MOOCs platform like Coursera, Infosys springboard etc.

question: What is the medium of instruction in the class?
answer: English is the medium of instruction in the class

question: Do you have any agents/consultant through whom we can apply?
answer: We do not have any agents through whom you can apply. Students/ Parents should contact the Institute Helpline No. 8010500700 and connect with the Institute’s Admission cell directly for any information/admission.

question: How does the college admission process work?
answer: UPCET Counselling - The candidate needs to appear for the JEE Exam and appear in online counselling of UPCET. Candidate needs to opt NIET as the preferred choice in any of the branches we offer. Direct Admission - The college may conduct admission tests / on a merit basis / other criteria defined by the college admission policy. In case you meet the eligibility criteria as per AKTU norms, then the application is further processed for document verification. Upon successful verification, you will be offered provisional admission.
